Improvements.Improvement: Refactor duplicate code into separate function
Improvements.Description: Almost exactly the same code is used for BIG_ENDIAN and LITTLE_ENDIAN byte order. The only difference is the loop direction and how sourceIndex is calculated. You could create a separate function to handle the shift operation. This function would take as parameters the byte array, the start index, the end index, the increment (1 for BIG_ENDIAN and -1 for LITTLE_ENDIAN), and the offset (offsetBytes or -offsetBytes).
